title: 'Suicide’ was actually hit-and-run: Dubai Police use AI-powered digital twin to crack case
summary_full: Dubai Police are now using advanced Digital Twin technology for crime scene investigations. This system creates precise virtual replicas of crime scenes. It has already helped solve cases like a bridge-fall incident, initially thought to be suicide, which was reclassified as a hit-and-run. Another case involving a structural collapse was also solved using this technology.
